description: Xamarin bindings to the native Android Agora.io Full SDK.
releaseNotes:
v2.1.0 (Released Jan 18th, 2017)
v2.1.0 is currently in beta version
New Function
Function	Description
Voice Optimization	Added a new scenario for game chatroom to save bandwidth and cancel noise
Voice Equalization	Added an interface to set the local voice equalization
Voice Reverberation	Added an interface to set the local voice reverberation
Onlne Statistics Query	Added Restful APIs to check the status of the users in the channel, the channel list of a specific company, and whether the user is an audience or host and etc
Camera Focus Change	Added a callback interface to indicate that the camera focus area is changed
17-Way Video	Supported 17 videos in a Video Call or Interactive Broadcast scenario
Video Source Customization	Supported the default video-capturing features provided by the cameras and the customized video source. See IVideoSource Interface for more detailed scenarios.
Renderer Customization	Supported the default functions provided by the renderers to display the local and remote videos to meet the most developersâ€™ requirements. Meanwhile, Agora provided a set of interfaces for customized renderers. See IVideoSink Interface for more detailed scenarios
Interactive Broadcast Optimization	Added a new set of APIs to enable faster integration with enhanced usabilty and function expandility. For developers upgrading to SDK v2.1.0, you can choose both/either of the legacy API and/or the new API, which are completely compatible.
Injecting External Video Stream	Added the function of inject an external video stream to an ongoing Live Broadcast
Improvement
Improvement	Description
Video Freezing	Reduced the video freezing rate in an audience mode
Video Freezing	Reduced the video freezing rate for specific devices
Authentication	Supported a new authentication mechanism. Each legacy Dynamic Key(Channel Key) corresponds to single privilege(e.g joining channel), but each Token in the new authentication mechanism includes all the priviledges(e.g, joining channel, host-in, stream-pushing and etc).
Hardware Encoder	Enabled hardware 264 encoder on Qualcomm, MTK, Hisilicon, and Orion chip
Hardware Encoder	Improved bitrate control for hardware encoder
Billing Optimization	Small video resolution will be billed according to voice-only mode, for example, 16 x 16
Bug Fix
Fixed the occasional playback noise on specific devices;
Fixed the occasional playback cracking voice on specific devices;
Fixed some occasional crashes;
origin: http://test-portal.agora.io/en/2.1/product/Voice/Product%20Overview/release_android_video
summary: Xamarin Agora Full Android SDK lets you use Agora.in-powered video sessions in apps
title: Xamarin bindings to the native Android Agora Video SDK
